body.name: Trueque Wireless Keyboard with 7 Colored Backlits, Wrist Rest, Phone Holder, Rechargeable Ergonomic Computer Keyboard with Silent Keys, Full Size Lighted Keyboard for Windows, Mac, PC, Laptop (L)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
features: 【7 Switchable Colors Backlight 】The ergonomic wireless keyboard comes with 7 switchable backlights and 3 brightness levels to provide you with a different visual typing atmosphere. Choose your favorite keyboard setting and take your desk setup to the next level. The keys will be clearer under the backlight, too. Let you work effortlessly in the dark typing.

【Ergonomic Palm Rest】Our light up keyboard with wrist rest and foldable stand design improves overall comfort and reduces pressure on hands and wrists. Helps your wrist to be in a comfortable position and better body posture. Perfect for those Office-men needing long time working with the keyboard.

【Rechargeable and Long Lasting 】The rechargeable wireless keyboard is equipped with Type-C charging cable, one charge has an extra long standby time of 24 months, This ergo keyboard has automatic sleep power saving mode and a separate ON/OFF switch. You can also adjust the light brightness at any time or turn off the light to save power.

【Quiet and Comfortable Typing】The responsive low profile keys offer fluid, quiet, laptop-like efficient typing. Our backlit wireless keyboard remove over 95% of disruptive sounds. Designed with convenience tablet/phone holder. You can work like using a laptop when place a tablet, or watch video while working.

【Wireless Stable Connection】Plug and play, no drivers need to be installed.2.4 GHz wireless keyboard technology provides a strong and reliable connection up to 33 feet without any latency, so you can operate your device from anywhere in the room.

【Wide Compatibility】 Compatible with all USB and Type c port devices for iPad, PC, Laptop, Smart TV, MacBook, Tablet, Smart-phone and more. Supports all Windows OS, iOS, Chrome OS, Linux, and Android OS, etc.
【Warranty】24 months warranty. If you have any issues with your order or this backlit wireless keyboard. plz contact us first, we will solve it for you, plz buy with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exceptional Comfort The ergonomic wireless keyboard has comfortable wrist rest so you can place your wrist on the cushioned palm to reduce the risk of fatigue and injury and enjoy natural, relaxed typing. Phone/Tablet Holder Our computer keyboard provides an extra place to put your phone, iPad or other gadgets without cluttering up your desk. It is very convenient and allows you to easily check your phone for incoming text messages or other things without having to pick it up. Quiet Scissor Mechanism We use a scissor-leg structure membrane lighted keyboard and can effectively reduce noise by 95%, which must be the perfect choice for office work.

Rechargeable and Long-lasting Built in 1600mAh battery, standby time is up to 3000 hours. The wireless keyboard comes with a Type-C charging cable to make charging easier. You can directly use PC, power bank, wall charger for keyboard charging. Smart LED Indicators This backlit wireless computer keyboard is designed with 3 indicators which can help you to know the status of your keyboard. When there is low power, the power indicator will flash and be green. Low-profile Responsive Key Every low-profile key of the ergonomic keyboard is fast responsive and tactile, which is also comfortable and easy to type.7 color backlit design, make you can typing in the dark easily.

Know More About Trueque Backlit Wireless Keyboard with Wrist Support Q1:How many lighting modes does this backlit keyboard have? A1:The backlit wireless keyboard has 7 switchable backlit modesand 3-level adjustable brightness. Q2:Can the letters light up? A2:The letters and edge of the keys both can light up. The light up letters help you type in the dark easily. Q3:How to turn on/off the LED lights and adjust the backlit lightings? A3:First, plug the USB dongle into computer. Then press Fn+Esc to turn on/off the keyboard backlight. Press Fn+F1 to change the backlight colors, Fn+Up Arrow (or Fn+Down Arrow) to adjust the brightness. Q4:How long does this Ergonomic Keyboard need to be charged? Does it come with a charging cable? A4: The rechargeable keyboard come with charging cable and it only takes 2.5 hours to fully charge and has an extra long standby time of 24 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this thing is quiet and the backlight is very cool and helps with the early morning reports i have to write. i like it very much the only downside is the fact the back lighting goes off after a min of non-typing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Keyboard with multiple features and Functionalities.
reviews.reviewText: Hi, I received this purchase very quickly thanks To the seller and Amazon!The packaging was nice and item were well protected. It comes in a colorful, very easy to open box.The texture of the keyboard is soft and easy to type on with good travel distance when keys are pressed. the backlit colors is also very good and its brightness can be adjusted with 4 levels as well as a 7 colors to choose from or you can simply switch the backlit off.The empty space available in the keyboard was very handy I used it with my 11 inch windows tablet.It is very easy to connect to a PC, laptop or a tablet. Just plug the wireless adapter and it is ready to use.Note: In case you have an iPad you can also use the accompanied converter to convert from USB-A to USB-C so your iPad can recognize it. this Converter can also be used to convert any USB-A to USB-C adapters.Did I mention that this keyboard comes with a rechargeable battery! The battery life is very good, I'm still using it since I charged it for the first time.The Keyboard is also equipped with many shortcut keys that will make typing and using on supported OS a nice experience, thanks to the accompanied Manual that was easy to read and direct to the point.All in all it was a good experience and I would like to thank the seller for this nice product. Finally I have a suggestion it would be nice to include a trackpad to the newest model of this keyboard as I feel adding a trackpad will make it superb to other keyboards out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Well-Priced, Okay Battery Life
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this keyboard for work, not gaming. It gets full use for 3-5 days per week, about 10 hours per day (30-50 hours per week). Overall, good for the price. Knocked a star because of the battery life not meeting expectations - I did not go back and read what the claim was so this could be consumer preference/error!Pros: Comfortable, responsive key strokes, multiple color customization options, backlight turns off when low on battery life, pen holder slot so it doesn't get lost in my deskCons: Keys are a little loud but I think I'm a strong typer. Battery life is short lived in comparison to other keyboards I've had. It has to be charged every few days, but still operational while charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the keyboard!
reviews.reviewText: I really like how quiet the keyboard is. The feel is great. The backlight wasn't on, but I messaged the seller and they responded immediately and told me to press Fn ESC which worked! Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with backlit keyboard!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality at a great price compared to competitors. Only dislike which is not that big of a deal is that I would have like to have control over how long keyboard stays lit before going off. I just hit control or windows key to bring it back on without effecting a current document. Other than that, I love the keyboard response better than my previous more expensive one which just crapped out on me after 3 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charging Cord Could be A Bit Longer
reviews.reviewText: Charging Cord Could be A Bit Longer. I have a "C" to USB cord so it was an easy work around for me. Like the color selection of the back lights and brightness control but could be a bit brighter (being nit picky here) The keyboard is a bit more sensitive/responsive and took me a few times to retrain my fingers. Holds a charge pretty well. All in all a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: after 6 weeks of use the keyboard stopped lighting, I reached out to the company and only needed to unplug and reconnect the usb receiver. The lights immediately returned!This keyboard is the same size as normal full-sized keyboards with the exception of being lighter in weight. The keys are very easy to type, as it doesn't require much pressure. As for being quiet, the keys are quieter than most, but the space bar seems to be louder than the other keys. I love the color and brightness choices. The keyboard will auto shutoff the backlit light within two minutes, but will immediately turn on with the press of a key. I have been using the keyboard at work for two weeks without an extra charge needed but I can't attest to how the performance of the battery life will be at this time. So far, I a very pleased with this keyboard.
